title: The Cryptovator
author: The Cryptovator
content: I am curious, have you heard about Digipad (DGP)? Currently hyped and I actually like what they are offering. Usually, I don't post any brand new tokens but Digipad seems interesting to me since they want to create a safer environment for crypto investors. Digipad is a private investment Launchpad where startup projects would raise funds. The most interesting thing is Digipad managed insurance if any of the project rugs are hosted on their platform. Because they will host only SAFU projects where project owners can't rug investors. After a long time, I have invested a brand new token lol. It's because they KYC'D with trusted Pinksale partners. Currently, they are in the presale phase. It's quite surprising they got listed on CoinMartketCap & Coingecko before starting a private sale. I have to say the team behind Digipad is quite strong. What do you think? You may look on their TG: https://t.me/digipadglobal

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: The Cryptovator on August 19, 2022, 06:39:32 PMI am curious, have you heard about Digipad (DGP)? To be honest, I have to admit that I have never heard of it. After digging around I saw that there are indeed others that are talking about this project, but it was hard to find some concrete information, except on the official website, of course. The idea behind Digipad is definitely interesting and I am looking forward to seeing what the team can come up with on the future. It is still very early for a solid conclusion but I am genuinely curious to see how this project will develop.

comments.author: Widdop37
comments.body: I've never heard about this project until now but it thus look interesting, I will look into the project further and if I am satisfied I can add this to my portfolio, since we are in a bear market its already a good time to start buying newly launched tokens too.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Looking at the initial coins and the featured services to offer, I think DGP is one of the rare project that will possibly give its investor a huge return.  With only 10m initial supply, the price can easily get to x times since it can be easier to manipulate or undergo pump and dump.  But I don't see any innovation on DGP since all the features it offers are already existing on the market.  Even though the possible huge profit is enticing, I think I'll pass on this one.

comments.author: kurniawan05
comments.body: I'm also watching this project and thinking about investing there, this is one of the interesting features of Digipad:- DIF will be used to give our investors compensation on private launchpad by following our  Anti Rug-Pull Policy.- Digipad have 30-days deadline for rug pull compensation which will work under anti rug-pull policy. If any project makes a rug pull during this window, our DIF compensation will be activated for the project's private investors.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: I have been trying with several hundreds USD. It's worthy to try. The team looks very active at this moment and pre sale already reached more than already aimed. Expecting 1 or 2 times return in a short time is still make sense at this moment. I didn't even expect this to go to the thousands percents return. A few times return more than enough,.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Before I saw the telegram group, I was interested in owning this $DGP token, especially after seeing the various things they offer in their project such as Insurance and others. But after seeing the activities in the telegram group, I have no interest anymore. It can be seen that the project only focuses on hype. This is very dangerous for investment.I don't have any good experience with projects that move on the basis of hype alone, let alone against communities that post token purchase notifications in their groups.

comments.author: waONE
comments.body: the DGP project is a good project like the Aqua Tank, DGP is also in the top trending at the Pinksale, the same as Aqua yesterday, and Aqua has already reached 4x, I'm sure DGP will also follow it, if a project is trending in the Pinksale, it is certain that the project will achieve high profit when listing

comments.author: kurniawan05
comments.body: Quote from: waONE on August 20, 2022, 11:16:11 AMthe DGP project is a good project like the Aqua Tank, DGP is also in the top trending at the Pinksale, the same as Aqua yesterday, and Aqua has already reached 4x, I'm sure DGP will also follow it, if a project is trending in the Pinksale, it is certain that the project will achieve high profit when listingI hope so too, trending means that a lot of people are paying attention to this project and want to invest in this project, it's worth a try and I think I'll invest a little to see how this project develops when it's listed.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Seems they raised 900 BNB so far and going to add Liquidity on Pancakeswap today at 17:00 UTC. Expecting a smooth launch, have aped a good amount lol. Still, now I like their marketing strategy seems to have a banner on dextools and bscscan. And have managed a large number of Telegram communities where posted Digipad. Good Luck with those bought from Pinksale.
